title: 【海潮搬运】 ——Calla's Morning
author: 海潮
txt_content:
本帖最后由 海潮 于 2015-5-20 18:04 编辑 
HI...
今日从PMC搬运了一个地图
名曰：
Calla's Morning
貌似是一个仙女岛吧...




作者的废♂话
Calla's Morning - The Arum Faerie's Wake 


Hello! I had to tap in my non-existent feminism for this project... In measure of epicness besides the Genesis Turtle, this may be the best one yet! Made in dedication to my sister's upcoming birthday this month, and she does adore the faerie fantasy. The reference I used for the build is in the featured image itself though edited to avoid anyone stealing it. As well, this pack comes in two maps - one with the garden and the other on a flat world. First time I did a humanoid terraform, it needs a bit of practice... Haven't used the default texture pack in a long time. Enjoy! Happy birthday sis! 


FUN FACT: The Arum flower, or lily, only has one petal and is an entirely poisonous genus. I guess this faerie isn't completely defenseless at all... 


   The screenshots include:           
WorldPainter, downloadable freeware (recommended for large-scale operations) 
World Machine, free and premium (recommended for large-scale terraforming) 
Chunky Render, downloadable freeware 
Fantasy Flowers by Discovery Works, downloadable bundle 
Link here 


Features:          
- Large humanoid faerie almost 150 blocks in height, sitting on a large arum lily. 
- Faerie consists of a pair of pink/red forewings and hindwings. 
- Custom-terraformed garden topped with the Fantasy Flowers bundle 



下载地址
http://yunpan.cn/cja7hXsiXJkIQ  访问密码 b5b0

好了，苹果树拿到了，现在不求人气只求金粒了，砸死我吧！
给人气的一律/kill @a 哦（版主除外XD）
